GV04sankharu:125: rājyaṃ ha vā idam u haiva cakṣate /

GV04sankharu:407: asti saṃvṛtaṃ loke yasmin mā dhāsyasi,
GV04sankharu:410: sa hovāca - nāham etad veda hantācāryaṃ pṛcchānīti /
GV04sankharu:411: sa ha pitaram āsādya papraccha - itīti māprākṣīt kathaṃ pratibravāṇīti /
GV04sankharu:412: sa hovāca - aham apyetan na veda /
GV04sankharu:413: sadasyeva vayaṃ svādhyāyam adhītya harāmahe yan naḥ pare dadati /
GV04sankharu:415: sa hi samitpāṇiś citraṃ gāṅgyāyaniṃ praticakrama upāyānīti /

GV04sankharu:424: atha yo na pratyāha tam iha vṛṣṭir bhūtvā varṣati /

GV04sankharu:427: taṃ pratibrūyāt - vicakṣaṇād ṛtavo reta ābhṛtaṃ pañcadaśāt prasūtāt pitryāvataḥ /

GV04sankharu:460: taṃ pañca śatānyapsarasāṃ pratiyanti - śataṃ phalahastāḥ,
GV04sankharu:477: tad yathā rathena dhāvayan rathacakre paryavekṣeta /
GV04sankharu:480: sa eṣa visukṛto duṣkṛto brahma vidvān brahmaivābhipraiti //

GV04sankharu:1119: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - pratilomarūpam eva tan manye yat kṣatriyo brāhmaṇam upanayeta /
GV04sankharu:1123: taṃ hājātaśatrur āmantrayāñcakre - bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti /
GV04sankharu:1127: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa,
GV04sankharu:1130: hitā nama puruṣasya nāḍyo hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratanvanti tad yathā sahasradhā keśo vipāṭitastvāvad aṇvyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1131: piṅgalasyāṇimnyas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya kṛṣṇasya pītasya lohitasya ca /
GV04sankharu:1132: tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati //
GV04sankharu:1135: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti /
GV04sankharu:1140: yathāgner jvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devāḥ devebhyo lokāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1141: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīram AtmAnam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ /

GV04sankharu:1143: tam etam ātmānam eta ātmāno 'nvavasyante yathā śreṣṭhinaṃ svāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1144: tad yatha śreṣṭhī svair bhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GV04sankharu:1146: evam evaita ātmāna etam ātmānaṃ bhuñjanti /
GV04sankharu:1147: sa yāvad dha vā indra etam ātmānaṃ na vijajñe tāvad enam asurā abhibabhūvuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1148: sa yadā vijajñe 'tha hatvāsurān vijitya sarveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyam ādhipatyaṃ paryait /
GV04sankharu:1149: tathau evaivaṃ vidvān sarvān pāpmano 'pahaty sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānām śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājya ādhipatyaṃ paryeti /
GV04sankharu:1150: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //

GV04sankharu:1168: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1169: ākāśaḥ saṃhitetyasya māṇḍavyo vedayāñ cakre - sa hāviparihṛto mene na me 'sya putreṇa samagād iti /

GV04sankharu:1182: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā vṛṣṭiḥ saṃdhiḥ saṃdhātā /

GV04sankharu:1213: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1216: sa ya enaṃ prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvan param upavadet śaknuvan kaścic cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ +samadhām /

GV04sankharu:1220: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt /
GV04sankharu:1221: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ //

GV04sankharu:1224: atha ced aśaknuvantaṃ manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīs tan nāśakaḥ saṃdhātum /

GV04sankharu:1227: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1229: pṛthivyāyatanaṃ nirbhujaṃ divāyatanaṃ pratṛṇṇam antartikṣāyatanam ubhayam antareṇa /
GV04sankharu:1230: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavadet /
GV04sankharu:1231: pṛthivīṃ devatām āraḥ pṛthivī tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1232: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded divaṃ devatām āro dyaus tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1233: atha yadyubhayam antareṇa bruvan param upavaded antarikṣaṃ devatām āra antarikṣaṃ tvā devatāriṣyatītiyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1234: yad dhi saṃdhiṃ vivartayati tan nirbhujasya rūpam /
GV04sankharu:1235: atha yac chuddhe akṣare abhivyāharati tat pratṛṇṇasyāgra u eva /
GV04sankharu:1237: annādyakāmo nirbhujaṃ brūyāt svargakāṃaḥ pratṛṇṇam ubhayakāma ubhayamantareṇa /
GV04sankharu:1238: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā avarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityenaṃ brūyāt /

GV04sankharu:1241: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna evaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāt
GV04sankharu:1246: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1247: atha vai vayaṃ brūmo nirbhujavaktrāḥ sma iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1249: tad yāsau mātrā pūrvarūpottarūpe antareṇa yena saṃdhiṃ vivartayati yena mātrāmātraṃ vibhajati yena svarāt svaraṃ vijñāpayati sā saṃhiteti /
GV04sankharu:1250: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1251: atha ha smāsya putra āha madhyamaḥ prātiyodhīputro magadhavāsī pūrvam evākṣaraṃ pūrvarūpam uttaram uttararūpam /
GV04sankharu:1252: tad yāsau mātrā saṃdhivijñāpanī sāma tad bhavati sāmaihāvaṃ saṃhitāṃ manya iti /
GV04sankharu:1253: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mā naḥ stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1254: ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ //
GV04sankharu:1256: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1258: prāṇaḥ pavamānena pavamāno viśvair devair viśve devāḥ svargeṇa lokena svargo loko brahmaṇā saiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1259: sa ya evam etām avaraparāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda evaṃ haiva sa prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena saṃdhīyate yathaiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā
GV04sankharu:1260: sa yadi pareṇa vopasṛṣṭaḥ svena vārthenābhivyāhared abhivyāharann eva vidyāt - divaṃ saṃhitāgamad viduṣo devān abhivyāhārārtham evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GV04sankharu:1262: mātā pūrvarūpaṃ pitottararūpaṃ prajā saṃhiteti bhārgavaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1263: tad etad ekam eva sarvaṃ abhyanūktam /
GV04sankharu:1264: mātā ca hyevedaṃ pitā ca prajā ca sarvam /
GV04sankharu:1266: aditir hevedaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃcid viśvabhūtam /
GV04sankharu:1267: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣaṃ aditir mātā sā pitā sa putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1268: viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam //
GV04sankharu:1269: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1270: jāyā pūrvarūpaṃ patir uttararūpaṃ putraḥ saṃhitā retaḥ saṃdhiḥ prajananaṃ saṃdhānam iti sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1272: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1273: prajñā pūrvarūpaṃ śraddhottararūpaṃ karma saṃhitā satyaṃ saṃdhānam iti kāśyapaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1275: tad āhur yat satyasaṃdhā devā iti /
GV04sankharu:1276: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1278: vācā vai vedāḥ saṃdhīyante vācā chandāṃsi vācā mitrāṇi saṃdadhati /
GV04sankharu:1279: tad yatraitad adhīte vā bhāṣate vā vāci tadā prāṇo bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1281: atha yat svapiti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā bhavati prāṇe tadā vāg bhavati prāṇastadā vācaṃ reḷhi. tāv anyonyaṃ rīḷhaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1282: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram āviveśa,
GV04sankharu:1285: taṃ mātā reḷhi sa u reḷhi mātaram //
GV04sankharu:1288: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1289: bṛhadrathaṃtareṇa rūpeṇa saṃhitā saṃdhīyata iti tārkṣyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1290: vāg vai rathaṃtarasya rūpaṃ prāṇo bṛhataḥ /
GV04sankharu:1291: ubhābhyām u khalu saṃhitā saṃdhīyate vācā ca prāṇena ca /
GV04sankharu:1292: etasyāṃ ha smopaniṣadi saṃvatsaraṃ gā rakṣayata iti tārkṣyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1293: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1294: gatiḥ pūrvvarūpaṃ nivṛttir uttararūpaṃ sthitiḥ saṃhiteti jāratkārava ārtabhāgaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1295: tasyām etasyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ dhvaṃsayo nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kalāḥ kṣaṇā muhūrtā ahorātrā ardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarāś ca saṃdhīyante /
GV04sankharu:1300: athādhyātmam - bhūtaṃ pūrvarūpaṃ bhaviṣyad uttararūpaṃ bhavat saṃhiteti kālasaṃdhiḥ /
GV04sankharu:1301: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mahat tan nāma guhyaṃ puruspṛg yena bhutaṃ janayo yena bhavyam /
GV04sankharu:1302: pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyaṃ priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca //
GV04sankharu:1304: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1306: pañcemāni mahābhūtāni bhavantīti ha smāha vāliśikhayaniḥ /
GV04sankharu:1307: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyautīṃṣi tāni mithaḥ saṃhitani bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1308: aatha yānyanyāni kṣudrāṇi mahābhūtaiḥ saṃdhīyante saiṣā sarvavibhūtasaṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1309: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1310: sarvā vāg brahmeti ha smāha lauhikyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1311: ye tu kecana śabdā vācam eva tāṃ vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1312: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha - ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmīti /
GV04sankharu:1314: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti /
GV04sankharu:1315: yatā caitad brahma kāmarūpi kāmacāri bhavatyevaṃ haiva sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kāmarūpī kāmacārī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1316: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:1318: prāṇo vaṃśa iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1319: tadu yathā śālāvaṃśe sarve 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāḥ syur evam evaitasmin prāṇe sarva ātmā samāhitaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1320: tasyaitadyātmanaḥ prāṇa ūṣmarūpam asthīni sparśarūpaṃ majjānaḥ svararūpaṃ māṃsaṃ lohitam ityetac caturtham antasthārūpam iti /
GV04sankharu:1321: treyaṃ tveva na etat proktam iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1322: tasyaitasya trayasya trīṇītaḥ ṣaṣṭiśatāni bhavanti saṃdhīnāṃ trīṇītas tāni saptaviṃśatiśatāni bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1325: sa eṣa saṃvatsarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1326: sa ya evam etaṃ saṃvatsarasaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda saṃvatsarasya sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute /
GV04sankharu:1327: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur etyasyāruṇikeyo devayāñcakre //
GV04sankharu:1338: eṣa u ha vai saṃpratiprāṇo yan majjā etad retaḥ na vā ṛte prāṇād retasaḥ siddhir asti /
GV04sankharu:1339: yad vā ṛte prāṇād retaḥ sicyeta tat pūyen na saṃbhavet /
GV04sankharu:1340: yān saṃdhīn adhidaivatam avocāma parvāṇi tānyadhyātmam /
GV04sankharu:1344: sa eṣo 'haḥsaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1345: sa ya evam etad ahaḥsaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda ahnāṃ sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute /
GV04sankharu:1346: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1347: catvāraḥ puruṣā iti vāstyaḥ - śarīrapuruṣaś chandaḥpuruṣo vedepuruṣo mahāpuruṣa iti /
GV04sankharu:1348: śarīrapuruṣa iti yam avocam ya evāyaṃ daivika ātmā tasyaitasya yo 'yam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā sa rasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1351: vedapuruṣa iti yam avocāma yena devān vedargvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti tasyaitasya brahmarasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1352: tasmād brahmiṣṭhaṃ brahmāṇam ṛtvijaṃ kurvīta yo yajñasyolvaṇaṃ vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1353: mahāpuruṣa iti yam avocāma saṃvatsara eva tasyaitasyāsāv ādityo rasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1354: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad iti vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1356: citraṃ devānām udagād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
GV04sankharu:1357: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //
GV04sankharu:1359: etām evānuvidyāṃ saṃhitāṃ saṃdhīyamānāṃ manya iti ha smāha vātsyaḥ -- etam u haiva
GV04sankharu:1360: bahvṛcā mahadukthe mīmāṃsanta etam agnāv adhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogā etam
GV04sankharu:1361: asyām etam antarikṣa etaṃ divi etam agnāv etaṃ vāyāv etaṃ candramasy etaṃ nakṣatreṣv
GV04sankharu:1362: etam apsv etam oṣadhīṣv etaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣv etam akṣareṣv etam eva brahmetyupāsate /
GV04sankharu:1364: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram /
GV04sankharu:1365: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
GV04sankharu:1367: sa eṣo 'kṣarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaś chandamayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1368: sa ya evam etam akṣarasaṃānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandamayaṃ manomayaṃ vāṅmayam ātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsati dugdhadohā asya vedā bhavanti
GV04sankharu:1371: yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti /
GV04sankharu:1372: yad īṃ śṛnoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti na hi praveda sukṛtasya panthām //
GV04sankharu:1374: nāsyānūkte vāco bhāgo astīty eva tad āha tan na parasmā etad ahaḥ śaṃset /
GV04sankharu:1375: nāgniṃ cinuyān na mahāvratena stuyān ned ātmano 'pihīyā iti /
GV04sankharu:1376: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad ity avocāma tau yatra vipradṛśyete //
GV04sankharu:1377: candramā ivādityo dṛśyate na raśmayaḥ prādur bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1380: saṃpareto 'syātmā na ciram iva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1381: sa yat karaṇīyaṃ manyeta tat kuryāt /
GV04sankharu:1382: athāpyādarśe vodake vā jihmaśirasaṃ vāśirasaṃ vātmānaṃ paśyen na vā paśyet /
GV04sankharu:1384: athāpi cchidrā chāyā bhavati na vā bhavati tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1385: athāpi cchidra ivādityo rathanābhir ivākhyāyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1386: athāpi nīla ivāgnir dṛśyeta yathā mayūragrīvā mahāmeghe vā marīcīr iva paśyet /
GV04sankharu:1388: abhra enāṃ mna paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1389: athāpy apidhāyākṣiṇī upekṣeta tatraitad varāṭakānīva na paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1391: ya eṣo 'gner iva jvalataḥ śabdo rathasyevopabdis taṃ na yadā śṛṇuyāt tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1392: athāpi viparyaste kanyake dṛśyete dvijihmevā na vā dṛśyetetad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1393: sa yo 'to 'śruto 'mato 'vijñāto 'dṛṣṭo 'nādiṣṭo 'ghuṣṭaḥ śrotā mantā vijñātā draṣṭādeṣṭā ghoṣṭā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āntaraḥ puruṣaḥ sa ma ātmeti
GV04sankharu:1394: vidyāt / sa utkrāmann evaitam aśarīraṃ prajñātmānam abhisaṃpadyate vijahātītaraṃ dauhikam /
GV04sankharu:1398: pṛthivyā rūpaṃ sparśā antarikṣasyoṣmāṇo divaḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1399: agne rūpaṃ sparśā vāyor ūṣmāṇa ādityasya svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1400: ṛgvedasya rūpaṃ sparśā yajurvedasyoṣmāṇaḥ sāmavedasya svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1401: rathantarasya rūpaṃ sparśā vāmadevyasyoṣmāṇo bṛhataḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1402: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇo manasaḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1403: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇa udānasya svarāḥ svarā iti punardattaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1404: eṣa u haiva sarvāṃ vācaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:1405: atha khalv iyaṃ daivī vīṇā bhavati tadanukṛtir asau mānuṣī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1406: tad yatheyaṃ śastravatī tardmavatī bhavaty evam evāsau śastravatī tardmavatī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1407: tad yathāsyāḥ śira evam amuṣyāḥ śiraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1408: tad yathāsyai vaṃśa evam amuṣyā daṇḍaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1409: tad yathāsyā udaram evam amuṣyā ambhaṇaṃ /
GV04sankharu:1410: tad yathāsyai mukhanāsike akṣiṇī ity evam amuṣyāś chidrāṇi /
GV04sankharu:1411: tad yathāsyā aṅgulinigrahā upastaraṇānīty evam amuṣyāḥ parvāṇi /
GV04sankharu:1412: tad yathāsyā aṅgulaya evam amuṣyās tantryaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1414: tad yathāsyāḥ svarā evam amuṣyāḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1415: tad yathā haiveyaṃ romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavaty evam evāsau romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1416: romaśena ha sma carmaṇā purā vīṇā apidadhati /
GV04sankharu:1418: sa ya evam etāṃ daivīṃ vīṇāṃ veda śrutavadanatamo bhavati bhūmiprāsya kīrtir bhavati
GV04sankharu:1419: +śuśrūṣante hāsya parṣatsu bhāṣyamāṇasyedam astu yad ayam īhate yatrāryā vāg vadati vidur enaṃ tatra //
GV04sankharu:1421: tad yatheyaṃ akuśalena vādayitrāvīṇārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam evākuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati
GV04sankharu:1422: tad yathā haiveyaṃ kuśalena vādayitrā vīṇārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam eva kuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati
GV04sankharu:1423: tasyai vā etasyai vīṇāyai yā tviṣiḥ sā saṃhiteti kātyāyanīputro jātūkarṇyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1424: atha ha smaitat kṛtsnahārito brāhmaṇam evodāharati //
GV04sankharu:1425: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā vyasraṃsata sa chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat /
GV04sankharu:1426: tad yac chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat tasmāt saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1427: tasyai vā etasyai saṃhitāyai ṇakaro balaṃ ṣakāraḥ prāṇa ātmā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1428: athaiṣā kṣudramiśrā vikṛtis tāni nakhāni romāṇi vyañjanānīti /
GV04sankharu:1429: sa yo 'tra vicikitset saṇakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṇakāram iti saṇakāram eva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1430: evam eva yo 'tra vicikitset saṣakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṣakāram iti saṣakāram eva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1431: tau vā etau ṇakāraṣakārau vidvān anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīyītāyuṣyam iti vidyād evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1432: atha vāg itihāsapurāṇaṃ yac cānyat kiṃcid brāhmīkṛtyevādhīyīta tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1433: te yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca māṇḍūkeyīyam adhyāyaṃ prabrūmas tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha hrasvo māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1434: atha yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca svādhyāyam adhīmahe tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1435: etad dha sma vai tad vidvāṃsa āhuḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe kimarthā vayam adheṣyāmahe vāci hi prāṇaṃ juhumaḥ prāṇe vācaṃ yo hy eva prabhavaḥ sa evāpyaya iti /
GV04sankharu:1437: nānantevāsine brūyān nāsaṃvatsaravāsine nābrahmacāriṇe nāvedavide nāpavaktra ity ācāryā ity ācāryāḥ //
GV04sankharu:1447: sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭho dīkṣe mā mā hiṃsīḥ //
GV04sankharu:1448: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1449: prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca /
GV04sankharu:1450: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhāṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati vāg vai vasiṣṭhā /
GV04sankharu:1451: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca cakṣur ha pratiṣṭhā /
GV04sankharu:1452: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ saṃpadyante śrotraṃ ha vā u saṃpat /
GV04sankharu:1453: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatano ha svānāṃ bhavati mano vā āyatanam /
GV04sankharu:1454: atha hemā devatāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyābruvan ko vai naḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GV04sankharu:1455: sa hovāca prajāpatir yasmin va utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭham iva manyate sa vai śreṣṭha iti //
GV04sankharu:1457: yathā mūkā avadantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1459: yathāndhā apaśyantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1461: yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1463: yathā bālā amanasaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1465: tatas tad yatheha saindhavaḥ suhayaḥ paḍbīśaśaṅkūn saṃkhided evam asau prāṇān samakhidat /
GV04sankharu:1466: te ha sametyocur bhagavan motkramīr iti /
GV04sankharu:1467: sa hovāca prāṇaḥ kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV04sankharu:1469: kiṃ me vāso bhaviṣyatīty āpa iti hocuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1470: tasmād vā ayam aśiṣyan purastāc copariṣṭāc cādbhiḥ paridadhāti /
GV04sankharu:1471: lambhuko hāsya vāso bhavaty anagno hi bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1472: had dha smaitat satyakāmo jābālo gośrute vaiyāghrapadyāyoktvovāca /
GV04sankharu:1473: apy evaṃ śuṣkasya sthāṇoḥ prabrūyāj jayerann asya śākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśanīti /
GV04sankharu:1474: vanaspate śatavalśo viroheti dyāṃ mā lekhīr antarikṣaṃ mā mā hiṃsīr iti ha yājñavalkyaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1475: atha yadi mahaj jigamiṣet trirātraṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ sarvauṣadasya manthaṃ dadhimadhubhyām
GV04sankharu:1476: upamanthyāgnim upassamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyottarato
GV04sankharu:1477: 'gneḥ kaṃse manthaṃ kṛtvā hutvā homān manthe saṃpātaṃ ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1478: jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1479: pratiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1480: saṃpade svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1481: tat savitur vareṇyam iti pacchaḥ prāśya tat savitur vṛṇīmaha iti paccha ācāmati mahāvyāhṛtibhiś caturthaṃ nirṇijya kāṃsyaṃ carmaṇi vā sthaṇḍile vā saṃviśati /
GV04sankharu:1482: sa yadi striyaṃ paśyet samṛddhaṃ karmeti vidyāt samṛddhaṃ karmeti vidyāt //
GV04sankharu:1486: etā ha vai devatāḥ puruṣa eva pratiṣṭhitā agnir vāci vāyuḥ prāṇa ādityaś cakṣuṣi candramā manasi diśaḥ śrotra āpo retasi /
GV04sankharu:1487: etāsu ha vai sarvāsu hutaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca /
GV04sankharu:1488: so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1492: pṛthivī tṛptā yat kiṃcit pṛthhivyāpihitaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1493: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //

GV04sankharu:1712: tad u ha vātmā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti /
GV04sankharu:1713: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena vividiṣanti brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā yajñenānāśakena ceti māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1714: tasmād evaṃvic chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyed iti māṇḍavyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1715: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇeṣu sa eṣa neti nety ātmā na gṛhya idaṃ brahmedaṃ kṣatram ime devā ime vedā ime lokā imāni sarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1716: sa eṣa tat tvam asīty ātmāvagamyo 'haṃ brahmāsmīti /
GV04sankharu:1717: tad etad brahmāpūrvam aparam anaparam anantaram abāhyam ayam ātmā brahma sarvānubhūr ity anuśāsanam iti yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1718: tad etan nāputrāya nānantevāsine vā brūyād iti /
GV04sankharu:1719: ya imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād idam eva tato bhūya idam eva tato bhūya ity anuśāsanam /
GV04sankharu:1720: tām etām upaniṣadaṃ vedaśiro na yathā kathaṃ cana vadet /
